title: Pourquoi Israel Israel Why By Claude Lanzmann

sources.title: Pourquoi Israel Israel Why By Claude Lanzmann
sources.description: ISRAEL, WHY Pourquoi Israel Directed by Claude Lanzmann Italy, France, 1974 Documentary 195 min. Synopsis Using interviews and other footage shot especially for this documentary, French director Claude Lanzmann investigates the state of Israel in 1972. This movie concentrates on Israelis going about their business of everyday living.
